sources.title: The Gunman from Bodie (1941)
sources.description: The Rough Riders are after a gang of rustlers. Marshal Roberts is posing as a wanted outlaw, McCall is the Marshal supposedly after him, and Sandy is on hand as a cook. sources.title: The Gunman from Bodie (1941) THE ROUGH RIDERS
sources.description:
Stars: Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton
 Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet

 The Rough Riders are after a gang of rustlers. Marshal Roberts is posing as a wanted outlaw, McCall is the Marshal supposedly after him, and Sandy is on hand as a cook. Roberts hopes his joining the gang will help bring them in.

metadata.Plot: The Rough Riders are after a gang of rustlers. Marshal Roberts is posing as a wanted outlaw, McCall is the Marshal supposedly after him, and Sandy is on hand as a cook. Roberts hopes his joining the gang will help bring them in.
metadata.Actors: Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton
